structure.unit: The General Laws, And Express Repeal Of Certain Acts And Resolves
The General Laws And Their Effect

law.catch_line: Pending Actions, Suits Or Prosecutions; Effect Of Repeal Of Law By General Laws
law.text: The repeal of a law by this act shall not affect any action, suit or prosecution pending at the time of the repeal for an offence committed, or for the recovery of a penalty or forfeiture incurred, under any of the laws repealed, except that the proceedings therein shall, when necessary, conform to the provisions of the General Laws.
